name: Buy Back Report
query:
select customer as "Customer Name::150",email_id as "Email ID::150",phone_no as "Contact No",item_name as "Buy Back Item Name::150",basic_price as "Buy Back Basic Price",estimated_price as "Recommanded Price::150",offered_price as "Offered Price::150",customer_acceptance as "Customer Acceptance",
coalesce(date_add((select max(creation) from `tabPurchase Receipt` where buy_back_requisition_ref=t.name),interval (select value from tabSingles where field='no_of_days') day) ,'')as "PIN Expiry",t.modified_by as "MPO::150",pr.modified_by as "Collection Officer::150"
 from `tabBuy Back Requisition` t,`tabPurchase Receipt` pr where pr.buy_back_requisition_ref=t.name
